actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to pay to the county executive of Montgomery County, Maryland, not more than $4,500,000 in matching funds for the purpose of reconstructing any public roads, paths, or walkways in Montgomery County which contain asbestos in quantities which the Secretary deems to constitute a health hazard.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make Federal funds available, on a matching basis, to the county executive of Montgomery County, Maryland, for the purpose of mitigating the health hazard caused by the asbestos found in the public roads, paths, and walkways of the county. Authorizes appropriations of $4,500,000 for this purpose.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to pay to the county executive of Montgomery County, Maryland, not more than $4,500,000 in matching funds for the purpose of reconstructing any public roads, paths, or walkways in Montgomery County which contain asbestos in quantities which the Secretary deems to constitute a health hazard.
